content: Drilling Stand DD HD 30 W/Wheels ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built-in fine feed – making drilling less tiring during sustained operation Angular drilling – easy, stepless adjustment up to 45° Comprehensive range of accessories available – such as vacuum pads, spacers, cross column, jack screws, fastening kits Easy set-up – tool-free quick-connection of drive unit Applications Drilling range up to 300 mm diameter without spacers Drilling range up to 600 mm diameter with spacers Coring at angles of up to 45° Can be fastened by anchor, using the optional vacuum pad or with the jack screw ### TECHNICAL DATA: Angular coring: Yes Column extension: Yes For use with: DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Technical Data | Angular coring | Yes | Column extension | Yes | For use with | DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Weight | 47.18 lb | Drill Stand Height | 31.1 in ### ITEMS- 3907943 - Drilling Stand DD HD 30 W/Wheels - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Drilling stand DD-HD 30 - 1x Wheel set DD-HD30-W
